references.reason: This paper introduced Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs), which are fundamental to the field of synthetic image generation addressed in the paper.

references.paper_title: A style-based generator architecture for generative adversarial networks
references.reason: This paper presents StyleGAN, a style-based generator architecture for GANs which is highly influential in generating high-quality synthetic images.

references.paper_title: Prompt-to-prompt image editing with cross attention control
references.reason: This paper introduces Prompt-to-Prompt, a method for image editing with cross attention control, highly relevant to the refinement pipelines described in the main paper.
This paper introduced Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models, which have become a dominant approach for image generation and a key technology used to enhance the work in the original paper.

references.paper_title: Improved baselines with visual instruction tuning
references.reason: This paper provides improved baselines with visual instruction tuning which is used in the GLaMM model leveraged in the approach taken by the original paper.
